body:
![[The screenshot should be here.]](http://www.cismet.de/images/beanmillSmall.png)

### Featurelist of this component:

* Jump to the logmessages in the editor (Doubleclick in the table)
* Jump to stacktrace elements in the editor (Single Click the links)
* Filter with regular expressions
* Filter with your editor selection on the fly
* Show logmessages from certain classes (controlled out of the editor context menu)
* Export/Import logmessages via XML
* …

### Kudos
The code is based on the [Lumbermill Log Viewer](http://traxel.com/lumbermill/). A project of Robert Bushman. 


### Updates
If you don't want to build it yourself. Just add the following URLs to your UpdateCenter-List:

[http://www.cismet.de/updatecenters/beanmill6/updates.xml](http://www.cismet.de/updatecenters/beanmill6/updates.xml) for 6.0 and 6.1
and
[http://www.cismet.de/updatecenters/beanmill6_5/updates.xml](http://www.cismet.de/updatecenters/beanmill6_5/updates.xml) for 6.5 and newer

(Just copy the link and click the add-Button of the Plugin-Dialog and click on Update)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Beanmill? File an issue and we’ll try to help you sort it out.
name: Beanmill
tagline: A component to visualize Log4J, JSR47 Logging Events (over Sockets) in the Netbeans IDE.
